Description:
Detects the execution of "ConfigSecurityPolicy.EXE", a binary part of Windows Defender used to manage settings in Windows Defender.
Users can configure different pilot collections for each of the co-management workloads.
It can be abused by attackers in order to upload or download files.


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Arbitrary File Download Via ConfigSecurityPolicy.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%configsecuritypolicy.exe%' and process_path like '%\configsecuritypolicy.exe' and original_file_name = 'configsecuritypolicy.exe') and (command like '%ftp://%' or command like '%http://%' or command like '%https://%'))
